titles: The declaration and engagement of the Marquesse of Huntley, the Earle of Atholl, Generall Midletou [sic], and many of the nobility of Scotland that have lately taken up arms for the defence of his Maiesties person and just authority.
author: Huntley, Lewis Gordon, Marquess of, d. 1653.
Atholl, John Murray, Marquess of, 1631-1703.
Middelton, Thomas, Sir, 1586-1666.
publisher: Printed by Samuell Broun English bookseller,
notes: Dated at end: This Declaration and Engagement was signed by the above nam'd persons the 20. of October 1650.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
